section: Exercise 3.13.1: Proofs by strong induction - combining stamps.
instructions: Prove each of the following statements using strong induction.
question:
(b)

Prove that any amount of postage worth 24 cents or more can be made from 7-cent or 5-cent stamps.
answer: k + 1. Therefore, it is possible to make k + 1 cents worth of postage using only 7-cent and 5-cent stamps. ■
